title.narrative: OUTPUT 4.3 ADVOCACY AND COMMUNICATION

description.narrative: Output 4.3 (Advocacy and Communication): This output is cross-cutting to programme implementation and includes community engagement, participation, accountability, and advocacy for behavioral change. Programme-specific activities should be included under 1.1., 2. 1 or 3.1. Duration: 03.2021 - 12.2025 GEM: SIGNIFICANT, which contributes to Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Cross-Sectoral - Social And Behaviour Change. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Output 1.1 (Care and Stimulation): In 2025, the coverage of care and stimulation services for children aged 0 to 3 years improves, especially in areas with a higher concentration of poverty. Duration: 03.2021 - 12.2025 GEM: SIGNIFICANT

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: El área de comunicación contribuyó durante el cambio de Programa País apoyando a las áreas de programas y PFP a maximizar el alcance de sus acciones con comunicaciones dirigidas a tomadores de decisión pero también a beneficiarios finales, a través de canales propios (especialmente página web y redes sociales) y mediante el uso gratuito de los medios de comunicación masivos (radio, televisión y prensa escrita) con piezas de campañas, comunicados y posicionamientos o entrevistas de los voceros de la organización. | Status:Met | As-of Date:17/01/2022
